Ability Description: Kill a maximum of 4 opponents OR kill a maximum of 4 teammates in the zone. You get to choose who.
Kill a maximum of 4 opponents in the zone. You get to choose who.
Kill a maximum of 4 teammates in the zone. You get to choose who. He kills himself too in the process and his dead body takes up useless space. Hence, he has 0 power.

A maximum of 4 supe teammates get hindered to a power of 0 as long as he’s alive. Applies to future supes as well (if initially less than 4 supes were boosted). You get to choose who. Chosen teammates cannot be changed as long as they are alive.

A maximum of 4 human teammates get boosted to a power of 8 as long as she’s alive. Applies to future humans as well (if initially less than 4 humans were boosted). You get to choose who. Chosen teammates cannot be changed as long as they are alive.
Kill a maximum of 4 opponents AND kill a maximum of 4 teammates in the zone. You get to choose who.
Get any opponentʼs card from the same zone to an empty slot in your zone

If Marie is alive in the same zone regardless of power and side, this
cardʼs power stays at 8

Freely choose up to 4 enemy females in the zone at the instant the card is
played to have 0 power while you both remain alive in the zone (N/A to Jordan Li due to
Lore accuracy). Females get their power back if they manage to shift to other zones or if
the character with Misogyny dies. Choices cannot be changed.
Get an extra turn

Put remaining 3 cards in deck and shuffle. Draw 1 card -> shuffle again. Repeat untill you draw 4 cards back. If <10 cards in deck, place cards back view up and let opponent(s) see a total of 1 random card in your hand, and then draw 1 card from deck.

1st death (from any card played by any side be it Diabolical or
Scorched Earth) this card returns to the deck. If the deck is empty, card stays in the slot.
2nd death = permanent death

1st threaten with death (from any card played by any side be it Diabolical or
Scorched Earth), move to another zone that has space. 2nd threaten = death

Freely choose up to 4 enemy females in the zone at the instant the card is

the character with Misogyny dies. Choices cannot be changed.

Shift one of your cards to another zone in an empty slot (from same

Put remaining 3 cards in deck and shuffle. Draw 1 card -> shuffle again. Repeat untill you draw 4 cards back. If <10 cards in deck, place cards back view up and let opponent(s) see a total of 1 random card in your hand, and then draw 1 card from deck.

Get an extra turn

Choose 1 enemy and 1 teammate in the same zone, both who have no abilities and are of equal power to each other. They link with Webweaver and move together if Webweaver moves between zones inﬁnitely if space exists on both sides, otherwise none can move even via abilities. Each movement costs a turn. If one dies, all three die

Move all enemy and teammate USELESS SUPES to Ezekiel's zone. Limit movement to the lower number between both sides' USELESS SUPES on the mat and the available space in Ezekiel's zone. For e.g., if one side has 5 on the mat and the other has 3 and Ezekiel has a space of 4, then 3 move. If Ezekiel has a space of 2, then 2 move. Both sides choose who goes.
Reveal 1 card to the enemy, and they reveal 1 to you - only after the enemy completes their next turn (i.e. after Mesmer is played). Play this wisely or be cocky. Your call.

Swap this card with an enemy card in their zone. The enemy card moves to your zone with 0 power. This ability cannot be used if your zone does not have space. Cards that have any abilities of their own cannot be affected.

This is one of 4 Splinter copies in the deck. You might have some or all while the enemy might have some or all. This copy cannot die at all even via Scorched Earth or Diabolicals. However once all 4 copies are placed on the mat, regardless of which side places them, all 4 copies die.
